thread.title: Oakview Architectural Services
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Oakview Architectural Services

author: Oakview Architectural Services
title: Oakview Architectural Services
text: I placed my order online on Country Attire's website, I had a problem ordering due to a technical glitch, so I contacted Country Attire via their social media page on Facebook. Their customer care was helpful and I got my order through soon after, just before New Years Eve. I'd ordered a Barbour quilted jacket for my husband, I'd checked the sizes and went up to large as I know some styles can be slimmer fitted, well it was a perfect fit and he loves his new jacket. It was Â£40 cheaper than buying direct from Barbour too, so very happy to recommend Country Attire.
